item.title: Building a TypeScript Video Downloader for Complex, Anti-Scraping Websites
item.description: How to build a robust video downloader from scratch with TypeScript, Node.js, and Playwright, capable of handling complex anti-scraping mechanisms, dynamic content loading, and network race conditions.
